alert.note: Alert for Allen; Evangeline (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:05PM CDT until September 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Evangeline Parish in central Louisiana... Northeastern Allen Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 605 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Beaver, or near Oakdale, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oakdale, Allen Parish Airport, and Beaver. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
